about_the_game:
Uncanny Valley: Machine is a story about a world that will be alien to you and at the same time familiar. This novel will tell you a story about survival, adaptation and overcoming the fears of the main character, about how two people find a way out of a monstrous situation. All this is accompanied by uplifting music and picturesque landscapes of night streets.

GAME FEATURES


Mini-games that add dynamics to the narrative.

Sneak through the alleys of the city, escape from monsters and cook dinner with a girl.

The variability of the passage.

The game has multiple endings and a number of unique deaths. Will you stay in proud solitude, or unite with another person?

Atmospheric, stylized interface and background.

The game takes place in a large, once densely populated city. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of melancholy and alienation, constant fear of the unknown, and contemplate the surreal landscapes of the night city.

content_descriptors.notes: Infrequent graphic violence, blood, wounds and text description of violence.

legal_notice: UNCANNY VALLEY: MACHINE is a story about a guy who leaves his apartment for the first time after nightmarish creatures resembling a mixture of man and machine invaded the city in which he lives. Immerse yourself in the story, save the girl, find salvation in the streets illuminated by the green moon.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Uncanny Valley: Machine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
